EcoGrid: Carbon Footprint Tracker & Green Habit Builder

- Single-file web app: one HTML file with inline CSS and JavaScript, no external libraries or resources  
- Purpose: Help users track their personal daily carbon footprint by logging activities; encourage sustainable habits via habit suggestions and progress visualization  
- Core features:  
  - Responsive grid layout adapting from mobile to desktop widths  
  - Keyboard-first navigation and controls: all interactive elements accessible and operable via keyboard (tab order, enter/space activation, arrow key navigation for grids)  
  - ARIA-compliant semantic markup for accessibility (roles, labels, live regions for updates)  
  - Activity logging: user can add, edit, delete daily activities contributing to carbon footprint; preloaded list includes transport, energy use, diet, waste  
  - Automatic carbon footprint calculation based on logged activities with standardized emission factors  
  - Green habit suggestions generated based on logged activities and reduction potential, with ability to mark habits as adopted  
  - Summary dashboard presenting daily footprint totals, weekly trends, and habit progress using accessible charts rendered with SVG  
  - Data persistence using localStorage to save activity logs, habits, and preferences across sessions  
- UI details:  
  - Color scheme with green and earth tones emphasizing environment theme  
  - Clear visual focus indicators for keyboard users  
  - Responsive grid for activity inputs, habit list, and dashboard panels, rearranging gracefully on narrow screens  
- Accessibility:  
  - ARIA roles and labels on interactive controls, landmarks for main app sections  
  - Live regions announce updated totals and habit changes to screen readers  
- Performance & sustainability:  
  - Minimal DOM updates, efficient event handling for low CPU/battery use  
  - No external requests or heavy assets for eco-friendly low data footprint  
- Extras:  
  - Date selector defaulting to current UTC date with option to view past days  
  - Keyboard shortcuts:  
    - Ctrl+N to add new activity entry  
    - Ctrl+H to toggle habit suggestions panel  
    - Arrow keys to navigate grid elements  
- Limit total code size to under 1000 lines for simplicity and maintainability in single file implementation
